typoman said <cite>I know but I m not telling you</cite>

Huh, did I miss something? Are you two class mates, competing in an ID challenge, or what?

[Nofret](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022635/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/nofret-bq/familytree.html) sounds good to me. Also similar to [Diotima](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022635/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=diotima+sc&x=0&y=0&sample_text=Faber%20Castell&sample_size=60), another calligraphic typeface by [Gudrun Zapf von Hesse](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022635/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gudrun%20Zapf%20von%20Hesse). Keep in mind that this is a logo: the letters may have undergone some modification, if not custom drawn in the first place.
